channel.title: ~~+ Raider Forums +~~
channel.description:
hello all and welcome to my topic :P
ive just started up a new forum called " raider forums " so far its looking great! :cool: but its just not good with 3 members :| so i encourage you all to register at www.z4.invisionfree.com/raider_forums so far we have 3 members, sjd0001 (me), starblaster100, ( co admin - incharge of scar boards ) and meur ( official pin seller/moderator)
(*) here is a list of some of the things that raider forums offers
- a mini rs clan ( rs raiders ) - black market for pins, mills and accounts - scar scripts, tutorials, free scripts and script sales - general forum - sharezone
so what are you waiting for? register now @ www.z4.invisionfree.com/raider_forums
[glow=red,2,300]we will be having competitions in which you can win rs2 gp[/glow]
[glow=red,2,300]we are also recruiting 1 police officer and 1 moderator[/glow]
cheers, yuhai
ps: mopar approved this topic ;)[br][size=1]Posted at: May 26, 2006, 03:53:05 am[/size][hr]BUMP ;)
